channel.title: Micropost, Recreation on Summitt Dweller's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Micropost, Recreation on Summitt Dweller's Blog

item.title: 21pilots.html
item.description: T-Mobile Arena downtown Kansas City for Twenty-one Pilots. And I am probably not the oldest person here after all. -/-/-/ location: Kansas City, MO

item.title: another-ms-soccer-in-the-books
item.description: Completed my third soccer officiating assignment tonight… STC middle school girls and boys doubleheader, plus two B-games, vs. Williamsburg. Another 2.5 hours total play, but again, not too bad. I still have so much to learn!

item.title: first-varsity-soccer-officiating
item.description: My knees and back are definitely feeling better than 2 weeks ago. Tonight I was AR2 for a varsity women’s match with Independence at STC. Final score was 11-2 on a very windy night, and it showed. The crew of TJ and Dustin did a great job and I feel like I learned a lot from them tonight. Thank you, gentlemen.

item.title: middle-school-soccer-dual
item.description: My back isn’t as sore this morning as I expected it might be. I did ref some middle school soccer matches last night on a VERY hard field at STC. Managed to trip over a sprinkler head that I don’t think has been “used” in years. -/-/-/ location: Toledo, IA

item.title: survived-first-soccer-officiating
item.description: Completed my first soccer officiating assignment tonight… STC middle school girls and boys doubleheader, plus two B-games, vs. Mt. Vernon. 2.5 hours total play, but not too bad. I still have a LOT to learn!

item.title: tama-walkingaudit.html
item.description: Tama walking audit…downtown and to Cherry Lake. -/-/-/ location: Tama, IA
